name: Square Chaser
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to beat the hardest game on the web? You are selected to become one of the worlds first square chaser. It seems simple enough right? Press A to move left and D to move right dodging obstacles. Can your mind endure 5-10-25- and 45 seconds of consistency. If you fail no need to fear, you can try again.... Right from the beginning of the level. Have fun, and don't tilt :)

This is the first official prototype released as a DrRuka Game. Created to test out reflexes and help build them up. Try not to get too frustrated, this game was not meant to be completed by everyone. It is  meant to get your hand-eye coordinationup to par so that you can play other online moba's, fps's, or mmo's. 

The game is completely free, but if you want to donate feel free to Everything is always appreciated.
